titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the tolling of the statute of limitations with regard to certain offenses committed by the President of the United States during or prior to tenure in office, and for other purposes.
No President is Above the Law Act
No President is Above the Law Act
No President is Above the Law Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents
